attributes.title: Draining the swamp
attributes.review: I downloaded the app because I supported our fearless cheese puff as he was going to drain the swamp. Instead, it corrupted my phone and drained my battery.

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: Why does he feel the need to have this? Oh wait it’s because he knows he’s going to lose

attributes.title: Fake News!
attributes.review: This app must have been developed by liberal snowflakes, because there is no way my Cheeto duster, racist, fascist leader would be able to use this app.
I am an avid trump 2020💖🌸🧚🧚😍🧚but on a tombstone supporter. But when I signed up to receive fake news, all I got was advertisements. I wanted to know about a president not a racist Cheeto. 🥴💖🧚🌸

attributes.title: Yikes
attributes.review: This app rolled back protections for LGBT people, caused the death of more than 100k Americans, and hid in a bunker because peaceful protestors scared it more than violent police. Would not recommend downloading.

attributes.title: Would give 0 stars if I could.
attributes.review: Wish I could rate better but like our president this app has to go 🤷🏻‍♀️

attributes.title: Don’t Download
attributes.review: Incredible waste of time and space. The app is unhelpful. Don’t force me to enter my phone number next time. Thanks.

attributes.title: God approves this message!! ⬇️⬇️✅
attributes.review: I was really excited for this app, but as soon as I downloaded it, I was struck by lightning and heard the voice of God say that Trump is not the move.

attributes.title: It doesn’t work
attributes.userName: bbbhin Bx hj Fed jhd hi lbffss
attributes.review: It doesn’t work for Americans living aboard, why? Fix it please, use email method to sign up

attributes.title: Requires personal info to enter app
attributes.review: No way to enter the app without providing name, phone number, email, etc.
